data.eml:eml: Identity of bryozoan species described by Jullien & Calvet from the Bay of Biscay historically attributed to Smittia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Souto, J., Reverter-Gil, O. (2019): Identity of bryozoan species described by Jullien & Calvet from the Bay of Biscay historically attributed to Smittia. Zootaxa 4545 (1): 105-123, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4545.1.6
